tool_description: Creates recurring schedule templates for healthcare providers with specific time blocks, break periods, and weekly patterns.

start_time.description: Daily start time in HH:MM format

end_time.description: Daily end time in HH:MM format

error_messages: Provider not found: No provider exists with the specified provider_id
Invalid time format: Times must be in HH:MM format (24-hour)
Invalid time range: end_time must be after start_time
Invalid days: days_of_week must contain valid day names [monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday]
Invalid duration: appointment_duration must be between 5 and 180 minutes
Invalid break format: break_times must be in HH:MM-HH:MM format
Break time conflict: Break times cannot overlap with each other or extend beyond working hours
usage: Provide provider_id, template details, and schedule parameters. The tool creates a reusable template for generating provider schedules.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the created template

slots_per_day.description: Number of appointment slots per working day
